[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/rspeedy](./rspeedy.md) &gt; [Filename](./rspeedy.filename.md) &gt; [bundle](./rspeedy.filename.bundle.md)

## Filename.bundle property

The name of the bundle files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bundle?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Default values:

- `'[name].lynx.bundle'`

The following placeholder is supported:

- `[name]`<!-- -->: the name of the entry. - `[contenthash]`<!-- -->: the contenthash of the bundle.

## Example 1

- Using content hash in bundle filename:

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'

export default defineConfig({
  output: {
    filename: {
      bundle: '[name].[contenthash].bundle',
    },
  },
})
```

## Example 2

- Using content hash with length in bundle filename:

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'

export default defineConfig({
  output: {
    filename: {
      bundle: '[name].[contenthash:8].bundle',
    },
  },
})
```
